mayor.title: A Message from Mayor
mayor.defaultBio: Welcome to our city's digital portal. We are committed to transparency, accessibility, and serving every citizen with dignity. Let's build our community together.

RoadmapPage.title: Product Roadmap
RoadmapPage.description: Transparency extends to our code. Here is what we are building next.

feedback.title: Community Feedback Loop
feedback.description: We build what you need. Participate in our feature request discussions or upvote existing ideas.

TechManifesto.title: The Sovereign Source Manifesto
TechManifesto.subtitle: We are not just building software; we are building institutions. Our technical choices reflect our commitment to Haiti's autonomy, resilience, and dignity.

2g.title: 2G-First Design
2g.description: We optimize for the lowest common denominator of Haitian connectivity. If a page doesn't load on an Edge network in a rural communal section, it is a bug.

accountability.title: Professional Accountability
accountability.description: Every municipal official is linked to a verified Vwa profile, turning local governance into a professional career path.

sovereignty.title: Data Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: Built with BSL 1.1, this platform ensures that Haitian municipal data belongs to the municipality, not foreign commercial entities.

transparency.title: Transparency as Code
transparency.description: Audit logs and fee structures are baked into the UI, making corruption harder to hide and success easier to see.

footer.title: Built for Haiti. Owned by Haiti.
footer.description: This repository is available under the Business Source License 1.1, ensuring that while the code is open for distinct inspection, its commercial value remains sovereign to the Haitian people.

ImpactPage.title: Why This Matters
ImpactPage.subtitle: We are building the digital infrastructure for a new era of civic trust. Our platform empowers citizens and officials to work together through four core pillars.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Real-time visibility into infrastructure funds. Every gourde collected and spent is tracked on a public open ledger, eliminating the shadows where corruption hides.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: Direct reporting loops. When a citizen reports a pothole or missing trash pickup, it goes directly to the dashboard of the responsible CASEC, creating a verifiable record of action (or inaction).

digital.title: Digital Transformation
digital.description: Moving from paper to pixels. We are replacing fragile physiocal ledgers with decentralized, cloud-backed mobile databases that survive floods, fires, and political transitions.

data.title: Data Access
data.description: A Single Source of Truth. Whether it's birth certificate procedures or school locations, citizens shouldn't have to rely on rumors. We provide official, verified municipal data.

leadership.title: A New Standard for Leadership
leadership.desc1: We aren't just tracking projects; we are documenting the professional legacy of the people building Haiti.
leadership.desc2: Through our partnership with Vwa, every Mayor, ASEC, and CASEC gets a verified professional profile. This allows citizens to see their track record, past roles, and verified achievements—creating a permanent history of service.
leadership.partnerSubtitle: The definitive verification platform for Haitian professionals.
